text: Sri Lankabhimanya Lester James Peries (Sinhala: ශ්‍රී ලංකාභිමාන්‍ය ලෙස්ටර් ජේම්ස් පීරිස්) (5 April 1919 – 29 April 2018) was a Sri Lankan movie director, screenwriter, and movie producer. He was known for his works Rekava, Gamperaliya, Nidhanaya, Golu Hadawatha, Kaliyugaya, Awaragira and Yuganthaya. His movie Wekande Walauwa was Sri Lanka's first ever submission for the Academy Awards.Dr Lester James Peries, Father of Sri Lankan Cinema , T.K.Premadasa, Asian Tribune Retrieved 30 March 2016 ==References== ==Other websites== *Sri Lanka Sinhala Cinema Database – Dr. Lester James Peries * *Official Website of Lester James Peries in association with Ministry of Cultural Affairs, Sri Lanka *ආචාර්ය ලෙස්ටර් ජේම්ස් පීරිස් ලොව ජ්‍යෙෂ්ඨතම සිනමාකරුවා වෙයි *ඔබට සුබ උපන් දිනයක් වේවා *ආචාර්ය ලෙස්ටර් ජේම්ස් පීරිස් ගැන සිනමා කිවිඳිය සුමිත්‍රා පීරිස්ගේ ආදරණීය හෙළිදරව්ව Category:1919 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Sri Lankan screenwriters Category:Sri Lankan movie directors Category:Movie producers
